MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool QuickContains (Android.Graphics.Rect r);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool QuickContains(class Android.Graphics.Rect r) cil managed

Docs.summary: Return true if the region is a single rectangle (not complex) and it contains the specified rectangle.

remarks.para: Return true if the region is a single rectangle (not complex) and it contains the specified rectangle. Returning false is not a guarantee that the rectangle is not contained by this region, but return true is a guarantee that the rectangle is contained by this region.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SetPath (Android.Graphics.Path path, Android.Graphics.Region clip);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SetPath(class Android.Graphics.Path path, class Android.Graphics.Region clip) cil managed

Docs.summary: Set the region to the area described by the path and clip.

remarks.para: Set the region to the area described by the path and clip. Return true if the resulting region is non-empty. This produces a region that is identical to the pixels that would be drawn by the path (with no antialiasing).

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteToParcel(class Android.OS.Parcel p, valuetype Android.OS.ParcelableWriteFlags flags) cil managed

Docs.param: Parcel object to write the region data into
Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or .
Docs.summary: Write the region and its pixels to the parcel.

remarks.para: Write the region and its pixels to the parcel. The region can be rebuilt from the parcel by calling CREATOR.createFromParcel().
